body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race have wings that do not provide the lift required for actual flight, but do have enough power to aid flight attained by some other method, and grant a +4 racial bonus on Fly checks.
name: Vestigial Wings
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Vestigial Wings
